item.title: Fortinet Patches CVE-2026-24858 After Active FortiOS SSO Exploitation Detected

item.title: OpenAI's ChatGPT ad costs are on par with live NFL broadcasts
item.description: OpenAI plans to begin rolling out ads on ChatGPT in the United States if you have a free or $8 Go subscription, but the catch is that the ads could be very expensive for advertisers. [...]...

item.title: Fortinet blocks exploited FortiCloud SSO zero day until patch is ready

item.title: AI & the Death of Accuracy: What It Means for Zero-Trust
item.description: AI "model collapse," where LLMs over time train on more and more AI-generated data and become degraded as a result, can introduce inaccuracies, promulgate malicious activity, and impact PII protection...
